core.cli

Class CLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.util.Worker
      • core.cli.CLI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class CLI
extends Worker
    This defines the functionality for a generic command line interface to be used by the client, errorSimulator, and Server
